SQLDataSource.Author: IFS RnD
SQLDataSource.Name: IND_SHIPMENT_MANAGEMENT_HANDLING_UNITS_IN_SHIPMENT_INVENTORY
SQLDataSource.Where: PARENT_HANDLING_UNIT_ID IS NULL AND NVL(&AO.COMPANY_SITE_API.GET_COMPANY(CONTRACT),'%') LIKE NVL('$COMPANY$','%') AND NVL(CONTRACT,'%') LIKE NVL('$SITE$','%') AND NVL(&AO.SHIPMENT_API.GET_STATE(SHIPMENT_ID),'N/A') LIKE NVL('$STATUS$','%') AND NVL(&AO.SHIPMENT_API.GET_RECEIVER_ID(SHIPMENT_ID),'%') LIKE NVL('$RECEIVER_ID$','%') AND NVL(NVL(&AO.Shipment_Flow_API.Get_Next_Step(SHIPMENT_ID),'N/A'),'%') LIKE NVL('$NEXT_STEP$','%') AND NVL(&AO.SHIPMENT_API.GET_SHIPMENT_TYPE(SHIPMENT_ID),'%') LIKE NVL('$SHIPMENT_TYPE$','%') AND NVL(&AO.SHIPMENT_API.GET_FORWARD_AGENT_ID(SHIPMENT_ID),'N/A') LIKE NVL('$FORWARDER$','%') AND NVL(&AO.SHIPMENT_API.GET_ROUTE_ID(SHIPMENT_ID),'N/A') LIKE NVL('$ROUTE$','%') AND NVL(&AO.SHIPMENT_API.GET_DELIVERY_TERMS(SHIPMENT_ID),'N/A') LIKE NVL('$DELIVERY_TERMS$','%') AND NVL(&AO.SHIPMENT_API.GET_SHIP_VIA_CODE(SHIPMENT_ID),'N/A') LIKE NVL('$SHIP_VIA$','%') AND SHIPMENT_ID LIKE NVL('$SHIPMENT_ID$','%') AND NVL(TO_CHAR(&AO.SHIPMENT_API.GET_PARENT_CONSOL_SHIPMENT_ID(SHIPMENT_ID)),'N/A') LIKE NVL('$CONSOLIDATED_SHIPMENT_ID$','%')
